name: Dido Arellano
profile: **Dido** is a full-stack web developer specializing in front-end JavaScript. He has been teaching JavaScript for more than 5 years and enjoys nothing more than helping guide others through their programming journey.

name: Datu Arellano
profile: **Datu** wears many hats. When not developing websites, he is a visual artist and musician, and an active member of the Anino Shadowplay Collective. He has 10 years experience in teaching HTML and CSS development.
